summary: Rebuilds an Helgen,making it an place for trade and crafts
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b]Rebuilds the Helgen from a new.Now it is more of Industrial Complex than an settlement.
There is various of crafts there and unique textures also.You can trade at Helgen,Tradehouse or you can use some of tools,
or trade with stolen goods at Thieves Guild den.
There is Carpenter,Distillery,Enchant  Center,Thieves Guild Den,Tradehouse and the Smithing area.
There is also small shrine to eight divines at hill overlooking the place.The shrine has Snow Elf textures.
The Helgen keep is remodeled into multipurpose object.It is an Bunkhouse for workers,it is also the office to conduct business.
There is kitchen,little coffe shop,canteen and lowest room is where there is an Priest of Arkay and balsaming room.
The Helgen is guarded by Imperial Guards,and there are totall of nine new npc's excluding five guards.

Version 1.2 - Added the Storehouse Tower and Printing Press.

[i]Hope you enjoy it :)[/i][/b][/size]
